data.title: Lotus Exige
data.subtitle: 3.5 V6 S Euro 5 2dr
data.description: 2013 Exige 3.5 V6 S in metallic Starlight Black with red details. Excellent condition, dry stored over winter. Recent annual service and clear health check along with MOT at Bell and Colvill Lotus. Wheels have just been stripped and powder coated, Recent set of Michelin PS4s, new front discs and pads and air conditioning serviced at Lotus so all ready for the new owner! New genuine floor mats. New Alpine DAB stereo with Bluetooth phone and audio streaming. Removable hard top with  lotus storage bag, Lotus indoor car cover and Lotus  outdoor cover. Two keys, all books and full service history with most original invoices present. EXIGE Number plate included at the right price! This stunning car always receives lots of interest and compliments. Recent MOT, Full service history, Pet free, Smoke free Next MOT due 20/04/2023, Full service history, Black, 5+ owners, £42,000

data.title: Lotus Exige
data.subtitle: 1.8 S Sports Touring Performance Euro 4 2dr
data.description: 2 LADY OWNERS . Very rare believed  one of only 13 U.K. cars in yellow. Recent service @ central Lotus. New clutch just fitted , Next MOT due 12/09/2023, Last serviced on 24/05/2022 at 71,217 miles, Full service history, Black Full leather interior, Solar Yellow Over Aspen White, 2 owners, All part exchanges considered, Generous allowances given.  Finance available @ Competitive Rates, £36,911

data.title: Lotus Exige
data.subtitle: 3.5 V6 410 SPORT 2DR
data.description: This is just stunning. Finished in special order Motorsport Black Metallic with Black Alcantara Pack, Gold stitching, Gold coloured spoiler uprights,  body accents and diamond cut alloy wheels. Air Conditioning, Motorsport Black Interior Colour Pack, Cruise Control, Sound Insulation. Only 1000 miles. Not to be missed Unique 410 Sport , Black, 1 owner, Perfect One Owner 7,000ml Example, £73,950
